0.text: Innate: K'Sante's abilities mark enemies hit for 4 seconds. His basic attacks against marked enemies are empowered to gain  25 bonus range and consume the mark on-hit, dealing 5 − 20 (based on level) (+ 1 / 1.33 / 1.66 / 2% (based on level) of target's maximum health) bonus physical damage.
0.html: Innate: K'Sante's abilities mark enemies hit for 4 seconds. His basic attacks against marked enemies are empowered to gain  25 bonus range and consume the mark on-hit, dealing 5 − 20 (based on level) (+ 1 / 1.33 / 1.66 / 2% (based on level) of target's maximum health) bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: 25 bonus range
5 − 20 (based on level)
(+ 1 / 1.33 / 1.66 / 2% (based on level) of target's maximum health)
(+ 1 / 1.33 / 1.66 / 2% (based on level) of target's maximum health)

1.text: All Out Bonus: Both the attack's damage and the mark damage are increased by 35% (+ 20% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 20% per 100 bonus magic resistance). The bonus damage dealt by consuming a mark is converted to  true damage.
1.html: All Out Bonus: Both the attack's damage and the mark damage are increased by 35% (+ 20% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 20% per 100 bonus magic resistance). The bonus damage dealt by consuming a mark is converted to  true damage.
markedPassages: All Out
true damage

0.text: Active: K'Sante slams his ntofo down in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: K'Sante slams his ntofo down in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.

0.content: 50 / 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 (+ 40% AD) (+ 30% bonus armor) (+ 30% bonus magic resistance)

markedPassages: slows

1.text: If this hits at least one enemy, K'Sante generates a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 2 times and refreshing on subsequent hits. At 2 stacks, the next Ntofo Strikes consumes them all to become empowered with a new effect.
1.html: If this hits at least one enemy, K'Sante generates a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 2 times and refreshing on subsequent hits. At 2 stacks, the next Ntofo Strikes consumes them all to become empowered with a new effect.

2.text: Empowered Active: K'Sante fires a shockwave in the target direction that applies the same effects to enemies hit, but also  pulls them towards him over 0.65 seconds and  stuns them for 1 second.
2.html: Empowered Active: K'Sante fires a shockwave in the target direction that applies the same effects to enemies hit, but also pulls them towards him over 0.65 seconds and stuns them for 1 second.
markedPassages: pulls
stuns

3.text: All Out Bonus: Ntofo Strikes's  cooldown is reduced by 1 second, up to a minimum of 1.33 seconds, but it will no longer slow all targets hit.
3.html: All Out Bonus: Ntofo Strikes's  cooldown is reduced by 1 second, up to a minimum of 1.33 seconds, but it will no longer slow all targets hit.
markedPassages: All Out
cooldown

4.text: Ntofo Strikes partially  resets K'Sante's basic attack timer. While  All Out, it fully resets the timer.
4.html: Ntofo Strikes partially resets K'Sante's basic attack timer. While All Out, it fully resets the timer.
markedPassages: resets
All Out
possibleConcerningAbilities: Ntofo Strikes partially  resets K'Sante's basic attack timer. While  All Out, it fully resets the timer.

0.text: Active: K'Sante  charges for up to 1 second, during which he increases Path Maker's range, damage, and  stun duration over the first 0.85 seconds of the channel. During this time, he gains  displacement immunity and 25% (+ 10% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 10% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1% per 100 bonus health) damage reduction.
0.html: Active: K'Sante charges for up to 1 second, during which he increases Path Maker's range, damage, and stun duration over the first 0.85 seconds of the channel. During this time, he gains displacement immunity and 25% (+ 10% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 10% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1% per 100 bonus health) damage reduction.
markedPassages: charges
stun
displacement immunity

1.text: Path Maker can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. Path Maker's charge cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.
1.html: Path Maker can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. Path Maker's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
markedPassages: interrupted
crowd control

2.text: Recast: K'Sante  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through,  carrying them alongside him, and  stunning them for a duration. This damage is capped at 50 − 475 (based on level) against  monsters.
2.html: Recast: K'Sante dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, carrying them alongside him, and stunning them for a duration. This damage is capped at 50 − 475 (based on level) against monsters.
markedPassages: dashes
carrying
stunning
monsters

3.text: All Out Bonus: Path Maker no longer applies its  knock back and  stun, but it deals bonus physical damage and its damage reduction is increased to 30% (+ 12% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 12% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1.2% per 100 bonus health), and has twice the charge speed and dash speed. Upon entering All Out, Path Maker's  cooldown is refreshed.
3.html: All Out Bonus: Path Maker no longer applies its knock back and stun, but it deals bonus physical damage and its damage reduction is increased to 30% (+ 12% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 12% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1.2% per 100 bonus health), and has twice the charge speed and dash speed. Upon entering All Out, Path Maker's  cooldown is refreshed.
markedPassages: All Out
knock back
stun
cooldown

4.text: Ntofo Strikes and  All Out can be cast during the dash. Path Maker's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Ntofo Strikes and All Out can be cast during the dash. Path Maker's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

All Out
cast-inhibiting crowd control

0.text: Active: K'Sante  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, and grants himself a  shield for 2 seconds. Footwork can be cast on allies to dash to them at an increased range and speed. If the ally is a  champion upon arrival, they receive the  shield as well.
0.html: Active: K'Sante dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, and grants himself a shield for 2 seconds. Footwork can be cast on allies to dash to them at an increased range and speed. If the ally is a champion upon arrival, they receive the shield as well.

shield
champion
shield

1.text: All Out Bonus: Footwork's dash speed and location range are increased, and it can dash through terrain.
1.html: All Out Bonus: Footwork's dash speed and location range are increased, and it can dash through terrain.
markedPassages: All Out

2.text: Footwork partially  resets K'Sante's basic attack timer. While  All Out, it fully resets the timer. K'Sante can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Footwork will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Footwork partially resets K'Sante's basic attack timer. While All Out, it fully resets the timer. K'Sante can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Footwork will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: K'Sante  roots the target enemy  champion for 0.5 seconds and gains  displacement immunity over the cast time, then shatters his ntofos to  knock them back, during which they are  revealed, and  blinks to the end location. The target is dealt physical damage near the end of the displacement and is  stunned for 0.25 seconds afterwards.
0.html: Active: K'Sante roots the target enemy champion for 0.5 seconds and gains displacement immunity over the cast time, then shatters his ntofos to knock them back, during which they are revealed, and blinks to the end location. The target is dealt physical damage near the end of the displacement and is stunned for 0.25 seconds afterwards.
markedPassages: roots
champion
displacement immunity
knock them back
revealed
blinks
stunned

1.text: If the target hits terrain during the displacement, they are knocked back through the terrain and dealt the physical damage once they emerge. At the end of the displacement, they remain  airborne for 0.5 seconds and K'Sante strikes them to deal additional physical damage, after which they are  stunned for 0.25 seconds.
1.html: If the target hits terrain during the displacement, they are knocked back through the terrain and dealt the physical damage once they emerge. At the end of the displacement, they remain airborne for 0.5 seconds and K'Sante strikes them to deal additional physical damage, after which they are stunned for 0.25 seconds.
markedPassages: airborne
stunned

2.text: After K'Sante  blinks, he enters All Out for 20 seconds, and the ability can be recast after 1.5 seconds within the duration.
2.html: After K'Sante blinks, he enters All Out for 20 seconds, and the ability can be recast after 1.5 seconds within the duration.
markedPassages: blinks

3.text: All Out: K'Sante gains a health threshold equal to  55% maximum health which cannot be modified nor exceeded by any means. Upon entering All Out, his current health is reduced to this threshold. Additionally, his  base armor and  base magic resistance are reduced by 85% bonus armor and 85% bonus magic resistance, respectively. In return, he gains  5 (+ 32.5% bonus armor) (+ 32.5% bonus magic resistance) bonus attack damage and  10% (+ 0.75% per 100 bonus health) omnivamp and modifies his basic abilities, which can be cast at no cost.
3.html: All Out: K'Sante gains a health threshold equal to  55% maximum health which cannot be modified nor exceeded by any means. 4.text: Recast: K'Sante ends All Out early.

5.text: K'Sante retains his maximum health and bonus resistances during All Out. Health lost from gaining the health threshold is not restored after the effect ends. Upon entering All Out, K'Sante is restored to 100% maximum mana which rapidly decays over the duration. His mana percentage prior to All Out is preserved and is gained back after the effect ends. If the target is knocked over terrain that is longer than 2000 units, K'Sante will  vanish during their displacement and reappear near the end of it.

All Out Bonus: Path Maker no longer applies its  knock back and  stun, but it deals bonus physical damage and its damage reduction is increased to 30% (+ 12% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 12% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1.2% per 100 bonus health), and has twice the charge speed and dash speed. Upon entering All Out, Path Maker's  cooldown is refreshed.

All Out Bonus: Path Maker no longer applies its  knock back and  stun, but it deals bonus physical damage and its damage reduction is increased to 30% (+ 12% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 12% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1.2% per 100 bonus health), and has twice the charge speed and dash speed. Upon entering All Out, Path Maker's  cooldown is refreshed.

All Out Bonus: Path Maker no longer applies its  knock back and  stun, but it deals bonus physical damage and its damage reduction is increased to 30% (+ 12% per 100 bonus armor) (+ 12% per 100 bonus magic resistance) (+ 1.2% per 100 bonus health), and has twice the charge speed and dash speed. Upon entering All Out, Path Maker's  cooldown is refreshed.

3.concerningText: Active: K'Sante  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, and grants himself a  shield for 2 seconds. Footwork can be cast on allies to dash to them at an increased range and speed. If the ally is a  champion upon arrival, they receive the  shield as well.

4.concerningText: Active: K'Sante  roots the target enemy  champion for 0.5 seconds and gains  displacement immunity over the cast time, then shatters his ntofos to  knock them back, during which they are  revealed, and  blinks to the end location. The target is dealt physical damage near the end of the displacement and is  stunned for 0.25 seconds afterwards.

If the target hits terrain during the displacement, they are knocked back through the terrain and dealt the physical damage once they emerge. At the end of the displacement, they remain  airborne for 0.5 seconds and K'Sante strikes them to deal additional physical damage, after which they are  stunned for 0.25 seconds.

If the target hits terrain during the displacement, they are knocked back through the terrain and dealt the physical damage once they emerge. At the end of the displacement, they remain  airborne for 0.5 seconds and K'Sante strikes them to deal additional physical damage, after which they are  stunned for 0.25 seconds.

1.concerningText: Active: K'Sante slams his ntofo down in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.

2.concerningText: Recast: K'Sante  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through,  carrying them alongside him, and  stunning them for a duration. This damage is capped at 50 − 475 (based on level) against  monsters.

Recast: K'Sante  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through,  carrying them alongside him, and  stunning them for a duration. This damage is capped at 50 − 475 (based on level) against  monsters.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to「 66% effectiveness 」「 0 − 26.4 (based on current missing health) 」 on ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by ( 15% / 7.5%) (+ ( 0.4% / 0.2%) per 100 maximum health). Your primary target is slowed for double the amount and has their damage against you reduced by 10% for 2.5 seconds (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 50 bonus health and 5% tenacity and slow resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by ( 15% /  7.5%) (+ ( 0.4% /  0.2%) per 100 maximum health). Your primary target is slowed for double the amount and has their damage against you reduced by 10% for 2.5 seconds (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  700

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
